verses.verse: And <WG2532> I saw <WG1492>, and <WG2532> behold <WG2400>, the Lamb <WG721> standing <WG2476> on <WG1909> the mount <WG3735> Zion <WG4622>, and <WG2532> with <WG3326> him <WG846> a hundred <WG1540> and forty <WG5062> and four <WG5064> thousand <WG5505>, having <WG2192> his <WG846> name <WG3686>, and the name of his Father <WG3962>, written <WG1125> on <WG1909> their <WG846> foreheads <WG3359>.

And <WG2532> I heard <WG191> a voice <WG5456> from <WG1537> heaven <WG3772>, as <WG5613> the voice <WG5456> of many <WG4183> waters <WG5204>, and <WG2532> as <WG5613> the voice <WG5456> of a great <WG3173> thunder <WG1027>: and <WG2532> the voice which I heard <WG191> was as the voice <WG5456> of harpers <WG2790> harping <WG2789> with <WG1722> their <WG846> harps <WG2788>:

and <WG2532> they sing <WG103> as it were <WG5613> a new <WG2537> song <WG5603> before <WG1799> the throne <WG2362>, and <WG2532> before <WG1799> the four <WG5064> living creatures <WG2226> and <WG2532> the elders <WG4245>: and <WG2532> no man <WG3762> could <WG1410> learn <WG3129> the <WG1487> song <WG5603> save <WG3361> the hundred <WG1540> and forty <WG5062> and four <WG5064> thousand <WG5505>, even they that <WG3588> had been purchased <WG59> out <WG575> of the earth <WG1093>.

These <WG3778> are <WG1526> they that <WG3739> were <WG3435> not <WG3756> defiled <WG3435> with <WG3326> women <WG1135>; for <WG1063> they are <WG1526> virgins <WG3933>. These <WG3778> are <WG1526> they that <WG3588> follow <WG190> the Lamb <WG721> whithersoever3699, Leviticus2 he goeth <WG5217>. These <WG3778> were purchased <WG59> from <WG575> among men <WG444>, to be the firstfruits <WG536> unto God <WG2316> and <WG2532> unto the Lamb <WG721>.
And <WG2532> in <WG1722> their <WG846> mouth <WG4750> was found <WG2147> no <WG3756> lie <WG1388>: <WG1063> they are <WG1526> without blemish <WG299>.

And <WG2532> I saw <WG1492> another <WG243> angel <WG32> flying <WG4072> in <WG1722> mid heaven <WG3321>, having <WG2192> eternal <WG166> good tidings <WG2098> to proclaim <WG2097> unto them that dwell <WG2730> on <WG1909> the earth <WG1093>, and <WG2532> unto every <WG3956> nation <WG1484> and <WG2532> tribe <WG5443> and <WG2532> tongue <WG1100> and <WG2532> people <WG2992>;

and he saith <WG3004> with <WG1722> a great <WG3173> voice <WG5456>, Fear <WG5399> God <WG2316>, and <WG2532> give <WG1325> him <WG846> glory <WG1391>; for <WG3754> the hour <WG5610> of his <WG846> judgment <WG2920> is come <WG2064>: and <WG2532> worship <WG4352> him <WG3588> that made <WG4160> the heaven <WG3772> and <WG2532> the earth <WG1093> and <WG2281> sea <WG2532> and <WG2281> fountains <WG4077> of waters <WG5204>.

And <WG2532> another <WG243>, a second angel <WG32>, followed <WG190>, saying <WG3004>, Fallen <WG4098>, fallen <WG4098> is Babylon <WG897> the great <WG3173>, that <WG3754> hath made <WG4222> all <WG3956> the nations <WG1484> to drink <WG4222> of <WG1537> the wine <WG3631> of <WG1537> the wrath <WG2372> of her <WG846> fornication <WG4202>.

And <WG2532> another angel <WG32>, a third <WG5154>, followed <WG190> them <WG846>, saying <WG3004> with <WG1722> a great <WG3173> voice <WG5456>, If <WG1487> any man <WG5100> worshippeth <WG4352> the beast <WG2342> and <WG2532> his <WG846> image <WG1504>, and <WG2532> receiveth <WG2983> a mark <WG5480> on <WG1909> his <WG846> forehead <WG3359>, or <WG2228> upon <WG1909> his <WG846> hand <WG5495>,

<WG2532> he <WG846> also shall drink <WG4095> of <WG1537> the wine <WG3631> of the wrath <WG2372> of God <WG2316>, which <WG3588> is prepared <WG2767> unmixed <WG194> in <WG1722> the cup <WG4221> of his <WG846> anger <WG3709>; and <WG2532> he shall be tormented <WG928> with <WG1722> fire <WG4442> and <WG2532> brimstone <WG2303> in the presence <WG1799> of the holy <WG40> angels <WG32>, and <WG2532> in the presence of <WG1799> the Lamb <WG721>:

and <WG2532> the smoke <WG2586> of their <WG846> torment <WG929> goeth up <WG305> for <WG1519> ever <WG165> and ever <WG165>; and <WG2532> they have <WG2192> no <WG3756> rest <WG372> day <WG2250> and <WG2532> night <WG3571>, they <WG3588> that worship <WG4352> the beast <WG2342> and <WG2532> his <WG846> image <WG1504>, and <WG2532> whoso <WG1536> receiveth <WG2983> the mark <WG5480> of his <WG846> name <WG3686>.
Here <WG5602> is <WG2076> the patience <WG5281> of the saints <WG40>, <WG5602> they that keep <WG5083> the commandments <WG1785> of God <WG2316>, and <WG2532> the faith <WG4102> of Jesus <WG2424>.

And <WG2532> I heard <WG191> the voice <WG5456> from <WG1537> heaven <WG3772> saying <WG3004>, <WG3427> Write <WG1125>, Blessed <WG3107> are the dead <WG3498> who <WG3588> die <WG599> in <WG1722> the Lord <WG2962> from henceforth <WG534>: yea <WG3483>, saith <WG3004> the Spirit <WG4151>, that <WG2443> they may rest <WG373> from <WG1537> their <WG846> labors <WG2873>; for <WG1161> their <WG846> works <WG2041> follow <WG190> with them <WG3326>.

And <WG2532> I saw <WG1492>, and <WG2532> behold <WG2400>, a white <WG3022> cloud <WG3507>; and <WG2532> on <WG1909> the cloud <WG3507> I saw one sitting <WG2521> like <WG3664> unto a son <WG5207> of man <WG444>, having <WG2192> on <WG1909> his <WG846> head <WG2776> a golden <WG5552> crown <WG4735>, and <WG2532> in <WG1722> his <WG846> hand <WG5495> a sharp <WG3691> sickle <WG1407>.

And <WG2532> another <WG243> angel <WG32> came <WG1831> out from <WG1537> the temple <WG3485>, crying <WG2896> with <WG1722> a great voice <WG5456> to him <WG3588> that sat <WG2521> on <WG1909> the cloud <WG3507>, Send forth <WG3992> thy <WG4675> sickle <WG1407>, and <WG2532> reap <WG2325>: for <WG3754> the hour <WG5610> to reap <WG2325> is come <WG2064>; 4671, 2325 for <WG3754> the harvest <WG2326> of the earth <WG1093> is ripe <WG3583>.

And <WG2532> he <WG3588> that sat <WG2521> on <WG1909> the cloud <WG3507> cast <WG906> his <WG846> sickle <WG1407> upon <WG1909> the earth <WG1093>; and <WG2532> the earth <WG1093> was reaped <WG2325>.

<WG2532> Another <WG243> angel <WG32> came <WG1831> out from <WG1537> the temple <WG3485> which is <WG3588> in <WG1722> heaven <WG3772>, he <WG846> also <WG2532> having <WG2192> a sharp <WG3691> sickle <WG1407>.

And <WG2532> another <WG243> angel <WG32> came <WG1831> out from <WG1537> the altar <WG2379>, he that hath <WG2192> power <WG1849> over <WG1909> fire <WG4442>; and <WG2532> he called <WG5455> with a great <WG3173> voice <WG2906> to him <WG3588> that had <WG2192> the sharp <WG3691> sickle <WG1407>, saying <WG3004>, Send forth <WG3992> thy <WG4675> sharp <WG3691> sickle <WG1407>, and <WG2532> gather <WG5166> the clusters <WG1009> of the vine <WG1093> of the earth <WG3754>; for her <WG846> grapes <WG4718> are fully ripe <WG187>.

And <WG2532> the angel <WG32> cast his <WG846> sickle <WG1407> into <WG1519> the earth <WG1093>, and <WG2532> gathered <WG5166> the vintage <WG288> of the earth <WG1093>, and <WG2532> cast <WG906> it into <WG1519> the winepress <WG3025>, the great <WG3173> winepress <WG3025>, of the wrath <WG2372> of God <WG2316>.

And <WG2532> the winepress <WG3025> was trodden <WG3961> without <WG1854> the city <WG4172>, and <WG2532> there came <WG1831> out blood <WG129> from <WG1537> the winepress <WG3025>, even unto <WG891> the bridles <WG5469> of the horses <WG2462>, as far as <WG575> a thousand <WG5507> and six hundred <WG1812> furlongs <WG4712>.
